Neural Guide — Your Free AI Learning Mentor

A 24/7, GPT-powered learning assistant that helps students: • Understand complex topics in their curriculum (from math to literature) • Get real-time help on homework or projects • Learn how to ask better questions and think critically • Available via web & mobile, in multiple languages

  • Tailored for K-12 and college students
  • Free and accessible globally
  • Safe, bias-monitored, and education-aligned
